name: Flowers are like friends; they bring color to your world (1)
description:
“If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly our whole life would change.”– Buddha

This art was created in Oct'2021 in water colors. Its a set of two paintings.

Please connect with me on twitter @singh99abhay or email me-  abhay99.tez@gmail.com if you wish to know more about this painting.
